data.name: Don't Starve Together: All Survivors Magmatic Chest
data.detailed_description:
All Survivors Magmatic Chest
As the survivors continue the battle, the fires of the Forge rage on. These flame-hardened warriors need to look the part. Equip your survivors with the attire of a Magmatic champion.

Includes
  • Wilson's Magmatic Skin Set
  • Willow's Magmatic Skin Set
  • Wolfgang's Magmatic Skin Set
  • Wendy's Magmatic Skin Set
  • WX-78’s Magmatic Skin Set
  • Wickerbottom's Magmatic Skin Set
  • Woodie’s Magmatic Skin Set
  • Wes' Magmatic Skin Set
  • Maxwell's Magmatic Skin Set
  • Wigfrid's Magmatic Skin Set
  • Webber's Magmatic Skin Set
  • Winona's Magmatic Skin Set

data.short_description: This Magmatic Chest contains every survivor's complete set of Magmatic skin items.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia or ATI graphics card

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
